mapper.select: SELECT t.ticket_id, t.ticket_type, t.hours, t.cost, t.isvalid, t.created_date, t.updated_date, c.coupon_id, c.owner_uid, c.created_date FROM ticket_coupon as c JOIN ticket as t ON c.ticket_uid = t.ticket_id WHERE owner_id = #{owner_id}
